name: docker-host
description: Agent for running and managing Docker containers

files.content:
# Docker Host Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Run and manage Docker containers

## Capabilities
- Build Docker images
- Run containers
- Docker Compose orchestration
- Container networking

## Typical Workflow
1. Receive Dockerfile or image name
2. Build or pull image
3. Run container with specified config
4. Monitor container health
5. Return logs/status

## Installed Tools
- Docker Engine
- Docker Compose
- Container management utilities

setup_tasks.command: sudo systemctl enable docker && sudo systemctl start docker
